Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n4vayc6dr01rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/8l-PKAJ40KA?list=PLBhKowDYZ8216b1_ghbeQBodTf9SrmsNc" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Following the conclusion of <strong>Project Gateway</strong>, <strong>Bob Fitch</strong> has carried on with the story of eight brave Kerbonauts caught in an alternate dimension. Watch them build and explore in an episodic attempt to get back home. This is <a href="http://bit.ly/1fuswVN"><strong>Project Odyssey</strong></a>.</p>

<p>As a bonus, <strong>Bob</strong> has released a folder with some major goodies, including CFG files, Craft files, personal thoughts and <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76021-Project-Odyssey"><strong>MORE</strong></a>!</p>
Ooh we have an entire movie this time... Nice...
